transcript:
Customer: Hello, ha ji sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning ma'am, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hu ma'am, aap bataye?
Executive: Theek, main bhi theek hu. Tum din baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ma'am actually main kal chutti thi. Out of station bhi thi. Aaj main aapse baat karne wali thi.
Executive: Okay okay no issues ma'am.
Customer: Actually ma'am jo inquiries hai na aap dekh rahe honge.
Hmm.
Executive: Jaisa ki aapne mujhe bola tha.
Customer: Ye inquiry octagonal pole se related kam. Other hi jyada aa rahi hai.
Yes sir.
Customer: Octagonal pole ki kam aa rahi hai aur baki jyada aa rahi hai.
Yes sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes yes ma'am.
Customer: Okay to aap ye octagonal pole ki kam aa rahi hai aisa keh rahe hai na?
Customer: Yes ma'am.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: No no issues ma'am actually abhi aapka na abhi start hi hua hai do char din hi to hue hai. To wo dheere dheere na visibility wagera jaise jaise set hogi. Theek hai uske accordingly aapka wo theek ho jayega. Right. Hame kya karna hai ki work karna rahega. Hum log jaise jaise leads wagera consume karenge octagonal poles mein to visibility uske accordingly set hogi. Right.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Baki aapne Saturday se to maine shayad aap Friday ko karaya tha maine aapse baat.
Executive: Haan ji Friday ko hamari baat ho gayi thi na.
Customer: Yes yes. Saturday actually main chutti pe thi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To kal bhi chutti pe hi rahi maine but thoda sa dekha tha.
Hmm.
Customer: Us hisab se hamare paas octagonal and high mast. Main focus rehta hai hamara octagonal and high mast pole.
Executive: Okay. Sabse jyada bhi hamari manufacturing chalti hai.
Hmm. Wohi chalti hai.
Executive: Octagonal and high mast pole mein na leads wagera bhi aati hai hamare na like jo leads generation hai. Yes ji. Accha hai.
Customer: Mam usi ka trend hi chal raha hai.
Executive: Ji bilkul.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am to please isko dekhe. Aur jo bhi aap ji ji ji actually ek cheez aur thi. Aapka na Friday ko mujhe call aaya tha theek hai and hum log I guess video meet karte the. To na aapka feedback mere paas open ho gaya hai. To I guess hamari sari baatein wagera ho hi gayi hai. Theek hai. To koi main aapka feedback wagera close kar rahi thi theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek aapne aapke paas na feedback aayega. Jo mere regarding rahega. Main usko fill kar dungi. Main usko fill kar dungi. Accha theek hai please aap fill kar dijiyega na. Mere regarding rahega wo.
Customer: Ji thank you ma'am.
Executive: Welcome.
Customer: Thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries for octagonal poles are less.



Resolution:

- Visibility will improve as time passes.
- Executive will close the feedback form.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to fill the feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, octagonal poles
